title: Calculation
context: ยง269-105 Calculation. The net energy metering calculation shall be made by measuring the difference between the electricity supplied to the eligible customer-generator and: (1) The electricity generated by the eligible customer-generator and fed back to the electric grid over a monthly billing period; and (2) Any unused credits for excess electricity from the eligible customer-generator carried over from previous months since the last twelve-month reconciliation period. [L 2001, c 272, pt of ยง6; am L 2005, c 104, ยง5]
